instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: Macbook Air Recall?? 2013 Macbook Air random shut downs
threads.message: I have an 820-3437 that randomly shuts down; either 5-10 seconds after logging in or during the Apple Logo screen.  No water damage at all.  My question is has anyone seen this before or heard of a recall from Apple and if I should advise my customer to take it to Apple first or start with the repair?

threads.title: Macbook Air Recall?? 2013 Macbook Air random shut downs
threads.message: Haven't seen this and it doesn't sound like something that will be easy or make sense to fix unless there's some obvious hint/starting point.
